Text: NGX Datafeed Cc Hello Jay I was wondering if you could tell me if there is a specific time each day that the datafile that we access is taken offline We had a little glitch last Friday when we tried to do our endofday poll at and couldnt access the file We were able to get a copy of the file from Enron locally in Calgary and it solved our problem Alternatively however we would like to adapt the code so it doesnt try to poll late in the day if the file wont be available late in the day Could you tell me if there are specific times when the file wont be available each day Thanks Jay Otherwise the feed is working really well Weve hammered out most of the implemenation bugs and it seems to be pretty smooth now Dan R Zastawny Manager Business Development Natural Gas Exchange Inc Suite th Avenue SW Calgary Alberta Canada TP N Phone Fax Visit NGX at Every right implies a responsibility every opportunity an obligation John D Rockefeller Jr
